conversation.author: DonLakeFlyer
conversation.body:
We now have decent group names for everything. Fixed parser for missing defines. I'm going to call it good from my side.

Still need lots of work with units and short description. But I'll leave that up to the firmware folks to clean up.

issue_comments.author: DonLakeFlyer
issue_comments.body: @LorenzMeier The QGC parameter xml parser is still kind of fragile. Can you ping me if you see pulls go by with param changes in them so I can review the meta data?

issue_comments.author: LorenzMeier
issue_comments.body: Yes, will ping you. Thanks for the cleanup!
